Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever one or more tokens leave the battlefield, each player draws a card.
[b]Wizard[/b] | {2}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Hero creature tokens.
